Source:

Return the FourCC of a chunk.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
buffer Uint8Array | !Array.<number> the RIFF file bytes.
index number The start index of the chunk.
Returns:
The id of the chunk.

string

Source:

Parameters:

buffer Uint8Array | !Array.<number> The file bytes.

The chunk.

write(chunks, bigEndian) → {Array.<number>|Uint8Array}

Source:
  • index.js, line 22
Write the bytes of a RIFF/RIFX file.
Parameters:
Name Type Default Description
chunks Object A structure like the return of riffChunks.read().
bigEndian boolean false if the bytes should be big endian. "RIFX" chunkId will always set bigEndian to true.
Returns:
The file bytes as Uint8Array when chunkId is "RIFF" or "RIFX" or the chunk bytes as Array when chunkId is "LIST".
Type
Array.<number> | Uint8Array

writeSubChunks(chunks, bigEndian) → {Array.<number>}

Source:
  • index.js, line 61
Write the sub chunks of a RIFF file.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
chunks Array.<Object> The chunks.
bigEndian boolean true if its RIFX.
Returns:
The chunk bytes.
Type
Array.<number>
